metadata.title: CVE-2022-29977 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: There is an assertion failure error in stbi__jpeg_huff_decode, stb_image.h:1894 in libsixel img2sixel 1.8.6. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted JPEG file.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
